app_title: HLTPC: How Long To Perfect Circle

intro.title: How Long To Perfect Circle?
intro.subtitle: Can you draw a perfect circle freehand?

question.title: The Question
question.content: How many attempts does it take for a human to draw a perfect circle using only a pencil, without any tools?

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content: Drawing a perfect circle is harder than it seems. Most people need multiple attempts to get close.

cta.title: Ready to Try?
cta.content: See how many attempts it takes you to draw a perfect circle.

draw.title: Draw a Perfect Circle
draw.instructions: Use your mouse or finger to draw a circle in the canvas below.
draw.calculating: Calculating similarity to a perfect circle.
draw.congrats: Congratulations! You drew a near-perfect circle.
draw.almost_message: Your circle is good, but not quite perfect yet.
draw.practice_message: Drawing a perfect circle is harder than it seems.
